docs.text: Usage ¶ To use this action, simple place the following file in your .github/workflows/ folder. .github/workflows/draft-release.yml name: 📦 Release on: milestone: types: [closed] jobs: release: name: 📝 Draft Release runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: 📰 Checkout uses: actions/checkout@v3 - name: 📦 Create draft release from milestone uses: quaternionmedia/milestones@main
